summary: The diff shows that Biography.tsx was modified to update the standalone name heading on line 2 of the tidbit block from 'Dr. Shane J Charbonnet' to 'Dr. Shane JC', which aligns with REQ-1. The file summary confirms the change, and the heading 'A Tidbit About Dr. Shane JC' remains unchanged. No backend files were altered. The implementation appears complete and correctly scoped.
